title: Ttelas
author: Ttelas
content: What are the major five things you will do if win huge amount money?. Is it to buy are car or start a business?        Let's discuss about it together.

comments.author: Ondekinecakabilirim
comments.body: Starting a business is not easy these days. Central banks are constantly raising interest rates. That's why money circulation is so difficult. Even big companies are laying off their workers. In fact, prominent economists talk about the risk of recession every day. If I make a lot of money, I will not start a business. It is very difficult to be a business owner under these risks. Instead of starting a business, I put my money in the bank and get interest income. When my money stays in the bank, there is a possibility that my money will lose value in the face of inflation. But when I start a business, I am likely to experience greater losses. I think banks or cryptocurrencies are safer than starting a business.

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on October 31, 2022, 11:00:25 AMQuote from: Ttelas on October 31, 2022, 09:56:09 AMWhat are the major five things you will do if win huge amount money?. Is it to buy are car or start a business?        Let's discuss about it together. $10000 is huge to me and from that, I will be able to start a business grocery business it needs a big capital, to build a house, buy a motorcycle and buy more Bitcoin and save what is left so from all these things I need not worry I can go on playing without thinking about the money that I gonna spend and lose, as my needs are covered by the business I'm setting up.This is the thing, each of us has a different understanding of the term "huge number". I wouldn't say no to 10k but It wouldn't take my breath away either.If I had 10k, I'd just waste it on things that I need on daily basis. If I had a huge amount like 100k or more, I'd do some investing and buy more bitcoin.

comments.author: Mauser
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on October 31, 2022, 09:56:09 AMWhat are the major five things you will do if win huge amount money?. Is it to buy are car or start a business?        Let's discuss about it together. That's so unrealistic to happen to me and still so many people think and dream about it. Of course I have thought about it extensively myself and made a plan. It's not really about 5 things I would buy, rather a few steps to take. Step 1 would be of course to cash out, no need to risk a huge win to go for an even bigger win. Step 2 would be to pay off all my debts, and give some money to my parents as they struggling right now with the rising living costs. Step 3 would be investing, rather than buy something big like a new car I would invest it and wait a few years to treat myself. My main investment would be crypto currencies and buying a house to rent out. Only then with the monthly rental income I would buy things for myself.

I'll be leaning on investing my winnings on properties and crypto. But still, I will continue on gambling and try to gamble higher than I used to but not too much that I'll get broke if ever I lose.
